about_the_game:
What is this?
Discord Rich Me! Is an application created by Varstep Studios that allows you to customize your Discord Rich Presence (RPC) quickly and dynamically.
Create, Save, Load, do whatever you want, Discord Rich Me! allows it!
In order to use Discord Rich Me! you must have an application on Discord Developer (IT'S FREE, GO FOR IT)

What we offer:
🧰 - Custom Status (you can use your application and put any details that you want)
💾 - Save Custom Status (Now you can save your Status. Up to 5 slots)
🔄 - Load your Status (Hmmm yeah?)
⏱️ - Elapsed Time
detailed_description:
What is this?
Discord Rich Me! Is an application created by Varstep Studios that allows you to customize your Discord Rich Presence (RPC) quickly and dynamically.
Create, Save, Load, do whatever you want, Discord Rich Me! allows it!
In order to use Discord Rich Me! you must have an application on Discord Developer (IT'S FREE, GO FOR IT)

What we offer:
🧰 - Custom Status (you can use your application and put any details that you want)
💾 - Save Custom Status (Now you can save your Status. Up to 5 slots)
🔄 - Load your Status (Hmmm yeah?)
⏱️ - Elapsed Time
name: Discord Rich Me! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that reproduces sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that reproduces sound

short_description: A complete Discord Rich Presence customizer.
